text.en:
Dunaree 
fort of the king 
Six Hundred and Fourty Nine Current Era

text.ga:
An bhfuil scéal na Tána 
ag éinne?

text.en: We the assembly of poets; have forgotten!
text.ga:
Dearmaid déanta againne,
Tionól na filí!

text.en: But we remembered the poets said,
text.ga:
Ach ba chuimhin linn, 
arsa na filí,

Gur imigh saoi as Éirinn 
chun na Mór-roinne
text.en: That a sage from Ireland went to the Continent,
and had with him a copy of the Táin

to exchange for a copy 
of the Esodir Sevilla Etymologies
text.ga:
len é a mhalartú ar chóip 
de Chuilmeanna Esodir Sevilla.
